body:
thanks a lot for this report!
may i ask you to reopen this issue in the mirall repo?

thx

jonmcdermott <notifications@github.com> schrieb:

>i just installed the 1.1.2 win7 client, it runs for a while then crashes. windows event log shows the following:
>
>faulting application name: owncloud.exe, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x50b37930
>faulting module name: ntdll.dll, version: 6.1.7601.17725, time stamp: 0x4ec49b8f
>exception code: 0xc0000005
>fault offset: 0x0003331f
>faulting process id: 0x1074
>faulting application start time: 0x01cdccdb841f867a
>faulting application path: c:\program files (x86)\owncloud client\owncloud.exe
>faulting module path: c:\windows\syswow64\ntdll.dll
>report id: f8909de9-38ea-11e2-a9e6-6c626d4af504
>
>---
>reply to this email directly or view it on github:
>https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/607

thanks, and done.

jon
